items.title: Sparkling candles may have led to deadly Swiss resort bar fire, investigators say
items.description: Investigators probing the deadly New Year's Day fire at a Swiss resort bar are looking into the possibility that it started from some sparkling candle...

items.title: WATCH:  Inside the search for diamonds in Arkansas
items.description: "GMA" takes you inside Arkansas' famous Crater of Diamonds State Park, one of the state’s top attractions.

items.title: More rain headed to drenched California as lake effect snow hits the East
items.description: After a New Year's Day filled with heavy rain and flash flooding, more rain is heading to drenched California.

items.title: WATCH:  Flying overseas for hair transplants a growing trend
items.description: A new wave of people are traveling overseas to places like Turkey for the procedure. ABC News' Lionel Moise reports.

items.title: WATCH:  New car tech to watch in 2026
items.description: ABC News' Danny New looks at what’s ahead for drivers, including some surprising old-school features.
